website_summaries.verdict: Once you find the size that works for you, chances are you will find that these slide sandals are ideal for more active leisure fun, plus they look good too.
pros: Stands out with a dual strap that provides more structure than typical slide-style sandals
cons: Sizes tend to be unreliable, as they may run either too small, too large, or true to size

customer_reviews.title: Sporty and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 6 and these fit perfect! Comfy and stylish....I wanted these slides because they have the 2 straps!
customer_reviews.author: Janith Totten

customer_reviews.title: Great supporting shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE SLIDES! I have foot problems and happened on a pair of these in a store a few years ago. Bought them to use as shower shoes; loved them! They have an arch support in them that is so good! I have bought 3 pair since them.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Southern Living

customer_reviews.title: Decent arch support
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair. Super comfy. I get bouts of planters fasciitis and although most doctors advise against wearing flip flops, there are days you can’t be without them. This style has a nice arch that you won’t find in other slides and the double strap keeps your foot in place. I always keep a pair next to my bed. They’re easy to slip into when you’re half asleep. I have tile floors and can’t be barefoot. These are great! I’m a size 6 1/2 but I order 7 in this style.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: HUGE! Not a woman's size 8
customer_reviews.text: The slides are not a woman's size 8, they run extra large. The description is not accurate. The quality looks poor. I've purchased many other athletic slides for a lot less and the quality is superior to this Nike model. They were packaged as pictured, without a box, and delivered in an Amazon poly bag.
customer_reviews.author: Poma

customer_reviews.title: Best summer slides EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These slides are wonderful! The footbed is spongy-cushioning so they can be walked in all day without tiring. There is an amazing tread that prevents slipping while walking on wet surfaces. The double bands keep the shoe in place comfortably. I have purchased multiple pairs! The orange/pink ones have garnered complements from friends and coworkers every time I wear them. Try these once, and you'll never look elsewhere for summer slides!
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are beyond comfortable. They’re very supportive with great arch support. The straps have a foam padding so they “hug” your feet as you walk. I’m a size 8 and ordered a size 8, they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8.5. Went with a 9, they were slightly too big . My toes are short so I was hoping to get away with an 8 so I ordered them and they were too small. keeping the 9
customer_reviews.author: Sm

customer_reviews.title: Cool Comfortable slip ons
customer_reviews.text: Wearing socks with these slip ons is easy. if you like to wear socks go head they’ll give way to accommodate. If not, they’re perfectly comfortable without. My size 7 fits Like a 7 and I have a bit of a duck foot, wide through the toes. The hot pink and tangerine color is fun and uplifting! Wash them with soapy water if the fool well gets dirty over time. They clean up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: rescue your pet

customer_reviews.title: These SLIDE right off
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals EXCEPT for the fact that they do just as they are titled and SLIDE right off as you're walking. You either have to drag your feet or wear socks AND drag your feet which is something I don't want to do given the fact that I paid over $50 bucks for them. I'm a size 8 and they are a perfect fit,they feel snug like they'll fit until you start walking.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Cordero

customer_reviews.title: The best slides, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace 2 year pair that I wear basically every day in the summer. The support is EXCELLENT, the straps are soft enough to not hurt me anywhere but still keep slide secure on my foot. Wish they didn't have the obnoxious logo across the front, but they are just my house shoes so it doesn't matter that much I guess. Highly recommend, worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: BeJoyfulNow

customer_reviews.title: I loved them, will be returning
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these and will be purchasing more seeing that Nike is always sold out. The product fit true to size and looks just as pictured above. Only downside is that there are suction cup indents on the soles of the shoe that feel like gum is on the bottom of your shoe and when walking the shoe pushes your heels out which is slightly uncomfortable. I believe that the shoe was made like that on Nikes end and know various other people with the same or similar style slides that have the same problem. Overall that is not a big deal but can get annoying when wearing them for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jamiyah W.

customer_reviews.title: I wear a size 9 1/2 to 10US and ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 1/2 to 10US and ordered a size10. They fit perfectly but snug and stiff as always at first with any Nike slide I've had until they somewhat conform to your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff2MyLew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and very cute. I'm a size 8, ordered an 8 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Get your normal size!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved these today and they fit great! I have two pair of Adidas slides and they fit abnormally large. I wear a 8.5 or a 9 in shoes and I ordered a 9 and they fit well. Adidas slides are huge and I can wear a 6 in those. These fit like regular shoes/ sandals so order your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Cooley17

customer_reviews.title: Product
customer_reviews.text: Man I love these slides this is a just choice. I was scared to order Nike from amazon but they are real .
customer_reviews.author: Fanny

customer_reviews.title: Great Arch Support and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am actually using these slides as house-shoes. Nice shade of pink, comfortable, and good construction. They run a little wide on me. With synthetic uppers I feel they are a little overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Michele My Belle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the shower use!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a larger size as my size was sold out. Worked out fine. Since the heel slowly depresses, it the arch is what prevents my feet from hurting. Nice slide!!
customer_reviews.author: Ltashmoo

customer_reviews.title: True to size!
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually a 7 but 7.5 in some shoes. I went with a size 7 and they fit perfect!! I love them
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as slides I have bought directly from Nike. More expensive too but couldn’t find them elsewhere. I’ll wait next time, it’s worth it for the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: KMLllll

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: The front strap had no give to it so my foot didn’t fit all the way in. I’m returning them
customer_reviews.author: jo w

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Cute pair of sandals, but the bulge in the middle of shoes made my feet look super big and wide. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Pam K.

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these flip flops. This is my second pair. I wore the first pair out wearing them every day. I get lots of compliments on them and they are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: TFMom

customer_reviews.title: Nike Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Nice sandals, the straps are a little tight but I suspect they will stretch some. Better tight than too loose. They stay firmly on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: odie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like them. They're genuinely comfortable, however sometimes the shoe sticks to the floor
customer_reviews.author: Dreya Denise

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but get a size bigger
customer_reviews.text: One sandals arrived bend(I’m assuming the shipping did this ) .but I’m hoping with time It can fix it self . They do run a little small .im a size 8 so I got a 9 and they are perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Comfy comfy and sturdy! Second pair bought!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair and love them so much, they are comfortable and sturdy- unlike flip flops! I love my pair so much that I got my girlfriend a pair too! She loves the feel and fit!
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia E. O.

customer_reviews.title: A little tight
customer_reviews.text: I received these and they were initially a little tight, I figured with more use they would break in but I've still yet to get there. They are well made and really comfortable though!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sandals
customer_reviews.text: First Nike slide I've ever owned and super comfortable! Wanted something I could easily wash when walking around outside the house and this is perfect. They stay on my feet and have even gotten a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: bowlin1

customer_reviews.title: Fit tight. Go a full size or half size up.
customer_reviews.text: Go a size up! I am a 5 1/2 -6 order a 6 ( since 6 1/2 was sold out.) The fit is too tight. Should have done a 7
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: NARROW!
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow. Can barely push my foot inside and I’ve never thought to have had “fat feet” if I sized up they would have been too large:
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stone

customer_reviews.title: LOVVVVVVVVVVVVVVE.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love lovvvvvvvvvvvvvvve. Sponsor me. That was a joke. I like them. I used to have a pair before I threw them out after three years of me consistently wearing them. Comfy, adorbs, and that’s all I got. True to size in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Love’n these❣️
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and cushy, they stay on your feet so much better than the single strap.
customer_reviews.author: sjacks

customer_reviews.title: Proceed with caution.
customer_reviews.text: These came as pictured. They’re super cute but the straps are a bit tight. You will have to break them in for a while before they are comfortable. They have a high arch mound, so some may find them very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: These slides feel great on your feet, not hard like some of the other Nike slides. The width is perfect however, they're a tad big causing you to trip occasionally because they do not come in half sizes. If they came in half sizes, they would be a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: China03

customer_reviews.title: Too, Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 5.5 sometimes a 6. I ordered a 6. I could barely squeeze my thin, narrow feet between the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Shezira

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: FAVORITE SHOE EVER! I don't think I'll ever take them off. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amber McClure

customer_reviews.title: Typical Nike Slides
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, fit well. Should've gotten a different color. The white stains REALLY fast and won't come clean. Leaves foot marks on first wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for a great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my NIKE slides... and am very happy with them. They arrived on time.. actually early but who’s complaing, right?? Delivery person was awesome as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Smithingell

customer_reviews.title: It comes smaller
customer_reviews.text: I like them I’m size 8 but it turns out I should of ordered size 8/12 because it’s to tight and makes me feel like my feet is to big I bought my correct size tho
customer_reviews.author: Selina

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome I have heel spurs plantar fasciitis and bursitis and I've been in this shoe about 10 minutes and it helping already
customer_reviews.author: CelesteG.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These slides are comfy. I would only recommend them for people with normal to narrow feet. The straps are a little tight at first.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable as I have mortons neuroma on left foot . They are a tad narrow for my foot but figure they will be ok around the house and when I'm doing yard work and watering .
customer_reviews.author: Kelley miller

customer_reviews.title: They are so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women 8.5, I ordered a 9 and they fit perfect and comfortable. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Keke

customer_reviews.title: arch suuport there but not the comfy quality of prior years
customer_reviews.text: Overall ok - fit is good and there is arch support. But my prior pair of these exact kind was much more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: So Nice

customer_reviews.title: Choose the smaller size
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews made it seem like if you’re and in between size go up the half size. I did - I’m usually a 7 1/2 so I bought an 8 and it’s actually a too large. I’m keeping them since they are just lounge and shower sandals but I’m curious if 7 would have been the better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sandals ever!
customer_reviews.text: First bought a pair through Urban Outfitters! They lasted me about 5 years with still a bit of support. These are so comfy I had to buy a new pair for myself, mom, and grandma. Obsessed. It's no wonder they are always out of stock !
customer_reviews.author: Steven & Michelle Lintz

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Comfortable for me. And fit just right. I'm a size 6 1/2 and I got these in a size 7
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Yes ...get yours!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Loveeeeeee This product!!! My best and most favorite purchase .....too bad the other colors are out im looking foward to buying more. The quality is nice!!! Its qorth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Plantar Fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I actually bought them because I currently have plantar fasciitis and wanted some slides that wouldn’t irritate this condition as much. They’re comfortable for this condition.
customer_reviews.author: Zakela Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not a pretty shoe
customer_reviews.text: They looked to much like boys shoes so I’m returning them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Runs mad small
customer_reviews.text: Perfect except they run so small I got a 9 that seems more of a 8. Ill try wearing socks (which I hate) to stretch them out
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Receive lots of compliments when wearing. The colors seem ...
customer_reviews.text: Receive lots of compliments when wearing. The colors seem to blend in with lots of summer prints. Wish they were a tad bit more narrow, not so wide,. Still my go to for quick errands
customer_reviews.author: Gy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer use
customer_reviews.text: Very cute sandal, but these run about a half size large. Perfect for summer use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: True to size and very comfortable, I am highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dae Marie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but size is off by at least 1 shoe size
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: They’re really cute! Although it took some time for my feet to get used to them bc they hurt from how arched the middle part of the sandal is. Would definitely buy again:)
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for new slides and I’m so happy I went with these ones. No blisters, very comfortable. My only concern would be, they’re hard to wear with socks. Other than that, so comfortable and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Aleah

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable! The arch support didn’t seem to be in the right place and caused pain just taking a few steps. I have normal, healthy feet so I have to blame the shoe. I tried a size 8 and a size 9 since I normally wear an 8.5
customer_reviews.author: kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: They have a great fit to them and accurate to size.
customer_reviews.author: Artaysha Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sister Slides
customer_reviews.text: I wear these almost every day, when its cold I just put on socks and rock the socks with sandals, very comfy once broken in, very stylish. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paiton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes out there. I wear these anytime I’m not at work. Cannot day enough about my Nike flops.
customer_reviews.author: K Watts

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I really love these sandals. I was disappointed because one strap came a little deformed. I think it must have been the packaging. Not very noticeable tho.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Galliher

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have worn them a good while, and really liked how they fit, comply, I needed a new pair so I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: They’re comfortable and way more expensive compared to the ones on the Nike website. I honestly don’t know if it’s a dupe or not but I went with it because I wanted a pair and Nike didn’t have my size on their website.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little large
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe normally I’m a size 9 it ran a little big but I’m wearing them anyway because they’re very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: chris renner

customer_reviews.title: Easy slide on.
customer_reviews.text: Great supportive arch. Easy to slide on. Inner sole is textured and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: sandra davis

customer_reviews.title: True to size!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfy! And such a pretty pink color! I usually wear size 8 sometimes 8.5 shoe size. I got size 8 and they fit perfectly. I love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Malena Troyer

customer_reviews.title: I got my size
customer_reviews.text: Nice I love them but anything with white don’t stay white for long
customer_reviews.author: Tbaby

customer_reviews.title: They’re great for outdoor
customer_reviews.text: I like that are easy to clean can wear them with anything , pants , shirts and even at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These slides are extremely comfortable, but unfortunately I won't get much wear out ...
customer_reviews.text: These slides are extremely comfortable, but unfortunately I won't get much wear out of them because of the way they are make under the bottom. Everytime I walk it's like a suction cup and it makes the noise too! It became annoying quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: have now bought my second pair for next summer....just to have a fresh pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied and disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product and I received 2 right feet. One was a size 8 and the other one was a size 9. Very dissatisfied and so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: brenda hurst

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. I have wide feet and they stretch. Also very good arch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & comfy
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Light weight with a good cushion feel. Trendy and comfortable. Will go great with white nail polish
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: EXPECTED BETTER
customer_reviews.text: Was sent in a box that looked like it was run over first and then the shoe was put in. There is not a return slip with it so I can't even return them and they also look used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, good fit
customer_reviews.text: Really like this shoe. I ordered my exact size and happy with the fit. The width fits like it’s Intentionally snug but not tight.
customer_reviews.author: shante

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable when walking on the road plus the water
customer_reviews.text: I used this in the ocean, and walking around to shop.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Tetreault

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes! Only thing was the 20.00 sticker on the bottom from the Dept store clearance center
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Strother

customer_reviews.title: Duo straps are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Just got them today. LOVE! Super cute and comfortable. Had to get them because of the 2 straps. Very trendy. I wear a 9 and they fit me true to size.
customer_reviews.author: MarsMars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Had these flips b4 and there still perfect fit my favorite Nike summer shoe
customer_reviews.author: Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 10 with a wide feet 😂 & they fit comfortable I will be ordering more in other colors
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B

customer_reviews.title: Just what she wanted
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my granddaughter. All I can tell you is that she loves them. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: crtLV

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this style - wish there were more color choices available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fitting
customer_reviews.text: They run small and are really tight at first I suggest getting a size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Tchienlie Jean

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet so they fit a little tight but it is true to size. They are still really comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Kween

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of these. Comfortable, long lasting. Perfect for lake or bedroom. They stay on my feet and my foot stays centered in the sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Many Interests

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Very comfy! After a few wears, I noticed that the shoe starts to “stick “ to the floors as I walk which can be very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Straps came unhlued
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fell apart after two days. The straps came completely unglued.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Watson

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable & stylish but much more practical than cheap flip flops
customer_reviews.author: KneeC

customer_reviews.title: Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Fit as I expected. This is not as roomy around the toes as the traditional banded slide.
customer_reviews.author: Hmj

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and comfy. Might be too tight if you have a wider foot
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My oldest daughter loved these slides. They are so comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my sandals
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my sandals !I have had many compliments on them .The color is brighter in person ,but I still love them .I do wish they had them in different colors that would be awesome!The shipping didn’t take long at all
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 8.5 wide and I got a 9- they fit perfect! Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not leave in sun
customer_reviews.text: Do not leave in direct sunlight. They shrivel up and shrink
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Holden

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice shoes, just have to break them in a little before actually wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylab25

customer_reviews.title: go a size up
customer_reviews.text: my slides were the exact length of my foot but I like for them to be a bit bigger or else it feels too small even tho its the size of my foot but really comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenia Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love them bbn got bbn them early thank you
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Arch support
customer_reviews.text: The arch support is high. I’m a bit flat footed so I had to break them on for comfort
customer_reviews.author: Angelique bias

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. This is my second one, very easy fit. Hugs my feet in the right places. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Coley

product_meta.title: Nike Benassi Duo Ultra Slide Womens Shoes
product_meta.description: The Nike Benassi Duo Ultra Women's Slide is made with a soft, pliable foam midsole for plush cushioning and a lightweight, carved-out outsole.
